div.span: Value Living Welcome to eaves Thousand Oaks – where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We have splendid Thousand Oaks apartments with a few little extras, like large walk-in closets, linen closets and generously spaced private patios and balconies. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Essentially, our Ventura County apartments in Thousand Oaks offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? Thousand Oaks Apartments by eaves If you are looking to live in the lovely Thousand Oaks area, we feel that you should have an apartment that is as comfortable and conveniently located as any home. At eaves Thousand Oaks, that is exactly what you will get. Set on Hodencamp Road near the meeting point of the Ventura and Moorpark Freeways, our Thousand Oaks apartment community provides the lush ambiance of the city's namesake with the conveniences of city-life and nearby Los Angeles. There is an abundance of entertainment and shopping options nearby, including the Sun Plaza Shopping Center, Conejo Valley Art Museum, Pegasus Fashion Lounge and Conejo Creek Park. Residents also have the benefit of several restaurants within walking distance, such as Great Kahn Mongolian BBQ, Cho Cho San Restaurant, Corrigan's Steakhouse and Juicy Fruit. Thousand Oaks Apartment Community When you join eaves Thousand Oaks, you’ll also have access to a variety of perks. Save money on your monthly gym membership by making use of our 24-hour, well-equipped fitness center and sparkling pool, both included at no extra cost. Perhaps most importantly, all of these amenities in and out of our community are tied together by a fantastic on-site management team who’ll take care of any management issues that may arise quickly and efficiently. Contact us to schedule an appointment and learn more about your new apartment in Thousand Oaks today.

div.h2: this is the real deal. this is eaves.

a.div: Understanding what you value goes beyond offering you a quality apartment. It means having a respectful, friendly staff that you know you can depend on when you need them. Giving you one less thing to worry about and one more way to feel at home in your new community. That’s eaves.
We know you value convenience. That’s why all of our locations are also carefully selected to put you within reach of local shopping, restaurants and public transportation.

You made a promise to yourself to live within your means. That doesn't mean living without. Take advantage of our special resident discounts, early deposit refund program, and longer lease term options.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

better than you expected.","description":"Value Living Welcome to eaves Thousand Oaks – where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We have splendid Thousand Oaks apartments with a few little extras, like large walk-in closets, linen closets and generously spaced private patios and balconies. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Essentially, our Ventura County apartments in Thousand Oaks offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? Thousand Oaks Apartments by eaves If you are looking to live in the lovely Thousand Oaks area, we feel that you should have an apartment that is as comfortable and conveniently located as any home. At eaves Thousand Oaks, that is exactly what you will get. Set on Hodencamp Road near the meeting point of the Ventura and Moorpark Freeways, our Thousand Oaks apartment community provides the lush ambiance of the city's namesake with the conveniences of city-life and nearby Los Angeles. There is an abundance of entertainment and shopping options nearby, including the Sun Plaza Shopping Center, Conejo Valley Art Museum, Pegasus Fashion Lounge and Conejo Creek Park. Residents also have the benefit of several restaurants within walking distance, such as Great Kahn Mongolian BBQ, Cho Cho San Restaurant, Corrigan's Steakhouse and Juicy Fruit. Thousand Oaks Apartment Community When you join eaves Thousand Oaks, you’ll also have access to a variety of perks. Save money on your monthly gym membership by making use of our 24-hour, well-equipped fitness center and sparkling pool, both included at no extra cost. Perhaps most importantly, all of these amenities in and out of our community are tied together by a fantastic on-site management team who’ll take care of any management issues that may arise quickly and efficiently.
